title: Linear Algebra Concept Design-Based Curriculum for University Engineering Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic matrix operations and understanding of vector space concepts
context.additional_context: For pre-service/in-service teachers, emphasizing advanced mathematics concept teaching competencies. Establishing visual modeling and collaborative learning environments using digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain geometric structures in three-dimensional space using concepts of linear combinations and spanning sets.
Learners can design abstract models applicable to real-world engineering problems based on the mathematical definition of span.
Learners can improve conceptual teaching strategies and develop validated educational materials through iterative Design-Based Research (DBR) cycles (three or more).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
